paon.description: Primary Addressable Object Name (PAON), typically building name or street number (see BS7666).

saon.description: Secondary Addressable Object Name (SAON), e.g. flat number (see BS7666).

street.description: Name of any thoroughfare in England and Wales which is the first or only street name in an address.

locality.description: Name of a place which is either a hamlet / village in a rural area or a subdivision of a town / city in an urban area.

county.description: Name of a geographic area which comprises either a current of former county in England of Wales or a Unitary Authority.
